proposals.title: Predict Indian Rice Export Value to Bangladesh Using Domestic Production Metrics
proposals.problem_statement: Forecast annual rice export value (INR) to Bangladesh using Indian production data for 2020-21 to 2024-25. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness with critical metrics (area, production, yield) fully populated for overlapping years. Focus on INR values per preference.

join_plan.notes: Join on financial year and 'Rice' crop type. Map all export descriptions to 'Rice' category. Use 'Total' season from production data for annual aggregation.

transform_ideas: Lag production metrics by 1 year to align with export timing
Normalize yield values by regional production capacity
Create interaction terms between production volume and yield rates
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill historical production data; drop pre-2020-21 records with >65% missingness

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2020-21 to 2023-24) and 20% testing (2024-25). Use RMSE and R² metrics for evaluation.
quality_checks: Check temporal alignment between production and export cycles
expected_outputs: Year-over-year prediction vs actual scatter plot
RMSE and R² metrics for 2024-25 forecast

proposals.title: Characterize Rice Export Composition and Correlation with Domestic Production Metrics
proposals.problem_statement: Analyze the distribution of rice varieties exported to Bangladesh and their relationship with national production metrics. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness by filtering to 2018-19 to 2022-23 (export data) and 2020-21 to 2024-25 (production data) where completeness exceeds 75%.

join_plan.notes: Join on financial year (2018-19 to 2022-23) where both datasets have ≥75% non-null values. Map 'Rice' in production data to all 'Description' entries in export data.

transform_ideas: Normalize export quantities by total annual rice production
Calculate year-over-year growth rates for exports and production
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop rows with missing values in joined year columns (≤25% missingness)

proposals.validation_plan: Cross-validate export quantity trends against production totals using Pearson correlation (r ≥ 0.6 expected for basmati/broken rice)
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% non-null values in all joined columns
Confirm production data 'Total' season aligns with export data calendar years
expected_outputs: Top 5 rice variety export profiles by volume/value (2018-2022)
Heatmap of export quantity vs. production correlation by year
Stacked bar chart of rice type composition over time

proposals.title: Unsupervised Segmentation of Rice Export Varieties Using Domestic Production and Export Performance Metrics
proposals.problem_statement: Identify latent clusters of rice export varieties based on their export quantity/value trajectories and corresponding domestic production metrics. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness

join_plan.notes: Join filtered export data (2020-25) with production data on Year and mapped 'Rice' crop, using Total season production metrics

transform_ideas: Normalize time-series values by domestic production
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop rows with missing values in core time-series columns (≤12.5% missing in 2018-19 data)

proposals.validation_plan: Evaluate clustering stability using silhouette scores and domain-validated cluster interpretations
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% completeness in all feature columns post-join
Check multicollinearity between production and export metrics

excluded_columns.reason: Categorical text not needed for clustering
Lower relevance to export value analysis

expected_outputs: Cluster assignments with rice variety groupings
Parallel coordinate plots showing cluster characteristics
